snippet: Adelina Sotnikova and Julia Lipnitskaia gave Russia a 1-2 lead after the women’s short program at the European figure skating championships in Budapest.
abstract: Adelina Sotnikova and Julia Lipnitskaia give Russia a 1-2 lead following women's short program at the European skating championships; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Adelina Sotnikova and Julia Lipnitskaia gave Russia a 1-2 lead after the women’s short program at the European figure skating championships in Budapest.

headline.main: Russian Figure Skaters Lead After Short Program
